product_name: Mountain House Breakfast Skillet ProPak - Single Serving
long_description: Hash browns, eggs, crumbled pork patty, peppers and onions for breakfast while backpacking! It's easy to see why this is one of the most popular Mountain House breakfast items to bring on the trail.
